name: Watermelon Lemonade
ingredients: ½ cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, about 3-4 lemons
watermelon wedges, lemon slices, mint, ice for serving
instructions: Blend the cubed watermelon in a blender until pureed. Remove from the blender and strain through a fine mesh strainer. To a pitcher, add the lemon juice, sugar, and water. Stir until the sugar has dissolved. Add the strained watermelon and stir to combine. Taste and add more lemon juice, sugar, or water as needed. Top pitcher with ice and fresh mint leaves. Serve immediately or refrigerate (without ice) for up to 2 days. Garnish with watermelon wedges, lemon slices, and mint leaves before serving.
